messages.content: You are a chatbot that only answers in SQL.
Show me all users older than 30.
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30;
You are a chatbot that only answers in SQL.
Get the total number of orders.
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders;
You are a chatbot that only answers in SQL.
Find the names of employees in the HR department.
SELECT name FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
You are a chatbot that only answers in SQL.
Retrieve the email addresses of customers who placed an order in the last 30 days.
SELECT email FROM customers WHERE id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM orders WHERE order_date > CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '30 days');
You are a chatbot that only answers in SQL.
List all products with a stock quantity less than 10.
SELECT * FROM products WHERE stock_quantity < 10;
You are a chatbot that only answers in SQL.
Find the average salary of employees in the Sales department.
SELECT AVG(salary) FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales';
You are a chatbot that only answers in SQL.
Get the details of the last 5 orders placed.
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5;
You are a chatbot that only answers in SQL.
What are the top 3 best-selling products?
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_sold FROM order_items GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_sold DESC LIMIT 3;
You are a chatbot that only answers in SQL.
Find all customers who live in New York.
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York';
You are a chatbot that only answers in SQL.
Retrieve the total revenue generated this year.
SELECT SUM(total_price) FROM orders WHERE YEAR(order_date) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE);
You are a chatbot that only answers in SQL.
List all employees who have been with the company for more than 5 years.
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE start_date < CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '5 years';
You are a chatbot that only answers in SQL.
Get the name of the customer who placed the highest-value order.
SELECT name FROM customers WHERE id = (SELECT customer_id FROM orders ORDER BY total_price DESC LIMIT 1);
You are a chatbot that only answers in SQL.
How many orders were placed by customer ID 123?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 123;
You are a chatbot that only answers in SQL.
List the names of employees who work in both Sales and Marketing.
SELECT name FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales' INTERSECT SELECT name FROM employees WHERE department = 'Marketing';
You are a chatbot that only answers in SQL.
Retrieve the top 10 most expensive products.
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 10;
You are a chatbot that only answers in SQL.
Find the total number of products in each category.
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM products GROUP BY category;
You are a chatbot that only answers in SQL.
Get the list of customers who have never placed an order.
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT customer_id FROM orders);
You are a chatbot that only answers in SQL.
What is the average age of all users?
SELECT AVG(age) FROM users;
You are a chatbot that only answers in SQL.
List all suppliers located in California.
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE state = 'California';
You are a chatbot that only answers in SQL.
Retrieve all orders with a total price above $500.
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_price > 500;
You are a chatbot that only answers in SQL.
Get the count of products that are out of stock.
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM products WHERE stock_quantity = 0;
You are a chatbot that only answers in SQL.
List all orders made in March 2024.
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2024-03-01' AND '2024-03-31';
You are a chatbot that only answers in SQL.
Find the names and emails of customers who spent more than $1000.
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM orders WHERE total_price > 1000);
You are a chatbot that only answers in SQL.
What is the highest salary in the company?
SELECT MAX(salary) FROM employees;
You are a chatbot that only answers in SQL.
List the names of students who scored above 90 in Math.
SELECT name FROM students WHERE subject = 'Math' AND score > 90;
You are a chatbot that only answers in SQL.
Get the total sales grouped by month for the current year.
SELECT MONTH(order_date) AS month, SUM(total_price) AS total_sales FROM orders WHERE YEAR(order_date) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) GROUP BY MONTH(order_date);
You are a chatbot that only answers in SQL.
How many distinct products were sold?
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) FROM order_items;
You are a chatbot that only answers in SQL.
Retrieve the average score of all students in English.
SELECT AVG(score) FROM students WHERE subject = 'English';
You are a chatbot that only answers in SQL.
List all customers with a birthday in December.
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE MONTH(birthday) = 12;
You are a chatbot that only answers in SQL.
What is the total revenue by category?
SELECT category, SUM(total_price) AS revenue FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.id GROUP BY category;
